ExtentFullyOOB: The entire selected temporal extent is no longer available. The date range slider has been reset.
LayerBarInvisibleTooltip: Closest date out of bounds. Layer not shown.
LayerBarMissingTimestep: The current map time is in-between this layer's available timesteps.
MapJumpForwardAll: Jump to the last time step
MapJumpForwardOne: Jump to the next time step
MapPlay: Play through the time steps at 1 second intervals
MapRewindBackAll: Move back to the first time step
MissingTimesteps: Some requested timesteps could not be retrieved. The temporal values have been updated.
MP4CreateNotifyCancelAnimation: The animation creation has been cancelled given your browser window has been resized
MP4ExportSubtitle: Preview the created animation and download using the button below
MSCAnimetEmail: Weather animation made with MSC AniMet
OverlaysTip: Overlays add information on top of displayed layers.
SnapLayerToExtent: Apply temporal extent and interval to animation.
SnappedLayer: Temporal extent and interval currently applied to animation.
StyleError: The WMS request failed with the style included in the request. The layer's style has thus been reset to the default style and may not match with the displayed legend.
UnhandledError: An unhandled error was encountered. The layer had to be removed.
